member.name: T:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget
member.summary: NLog Target for writing to ElasticSearch using low level client

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.ConnectionStringName
member.summary:
Gets or sets a connection string name to retrieve the Uri from.
Use as an alternative to Uri

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.Uri
member.summary: Gets or sets the elasticsearch uri, can be multiple comma separated.

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.RequireAuth
member.summary: Set it to true if ElasticSearch uses BasicAuth

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.Username
member.summary: Username for basic auth

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.Password
member.summary: Password for basic auth

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.ProxyAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the proxy address

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.ProxyUserName
member.summary: Gets or sets the proxy username

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.ProxyPassword
member.summary: Gets or sets the proxy password

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.DisableAutomaticProxyDetection
member.summary: Set it to true to disable proxy detection

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.DisableCertificateValidation
member.summary: Set it to true to disable SSL certificate validation

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.DisablePing
member.summary: Set it to true to disable use of ping to checking if node is alive

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.EnableHttpCompression
member.summary: Set it to true to enable HttpCompression (Must be enabled on server)

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.Index
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the elasticsearch index to write to.

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.IncludeAllProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to include all properties of the log event in the document

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.ExcludedProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets a comma separated list of excluded properties when setting

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.DocumentType
member.summary: Gets or sets the document type for the elasticsearch index.

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.OpCodeCreate
member.summary: Gets or sets to only create index for the document if it does not already exist (put if absent). Required when request targets a data stream.
member.remarks: Elastic ver. 7.9 is required for using data streams.

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.Pipeline
member.summary: Gets or sets the pipeline transformation

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.Fields
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of additional fields to add to the elasticsearch document.

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.ObjectTypeConverters
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of object types and their override of JsonConverter

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.ElasticsearchSerializer
member.summary: Gets or sets an alternative serializer for the elasticsearch client to use.

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.ThrowExceptions
member.summary:
Gets or sets if exceptions will be rethrown.
Set it to true if ElasticSearchTarget target is used within FallbackGroup target (https://github.com/NLog/NLog/wiki/FallbackGroup-target).

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.MaxRecursionLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets whether it should perform safe object-reflection (-1 = Unsafe, 0 - No Reflection, 1 - Simple Reflection, 2 - Full Reflection)

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.ElasticSearch.ElasticSearchTarget.EnableJsonLayout
member.summary: Take the raw output from configured JsonLayout and send as document (Instead of creating expando-object for document serialization)

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Replaces dot ('.') character in Keys with an underscore ('_')

member.summary: Serializes all non-simple properties as object.ToString()

member.summary:
Gets or sets the elasticsearch cloud id.
If both apiKey and apiKeyId is provided, will be used.
Otherwise, will be used.

summary.para: Automatically add @timestamp, level, message and exception.* properties.
Set to false if you want to explicitly specify the document fields.
